description: Commands to manage DotNet components within the environment.

commands.name: az containerapp env dotnet-component create
commands.summary: Command to create DotNet component to enable Aspire Dashboard. Supported DotNet component type is Aspire Dashboard.
examples:
az containerapp env dotnet-component create -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyDotNetComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment \
    --type AspireDashboard

commands.name: az containerapp env dotnet-component delete
commands.summary: Command to delete DotNet component to disable Aspire Dashboard.
examples:
az containerapp env dotnet-component delete -g MyResourceGroup \
    -n MyDotNetComponentName \
    --environment MyEnvironment

commands.name: az containerapp env dotnet-component list
commands.summary: Command to list DotNet components within the environment.
examples: az containerapp env dotnet-component list -g MyResourceGroup --environment MyEnvironment

commands.name: az containerapp env dotnet-component show
commands.summary: Command to show DotNet component in environment.
examples: az containerapp env dotnet-component show -n MyDotNetComponentName --environment MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup
